intro: Cardiospermum grandiflorum f. genuinum, commonly known as the large-flowered heartseed. It is a flowering plant belonging to the family Convolvulaceae, characterized by its distinctive heart-shaped seed pods. The plant produces showy, white to pinkish flowers that bloom in clusters. Its leaves are alternate, heart-shaped, and have a velvety texture. The species is native to tropical regions of the Americas and is often cultivated for its ornamental value.
